creator: prasad.subramanian@sun.com
text:
The XML view of a JSP page generated by XMLOutputter has incrrect syntax in the
following area:
<%@page isErrorPage="false" %>
is transformed as 
<jsp:directive.page isErrorpage="false" >
** Note that the element has not been closed.

creator: prasad.subramanian@sun.com
text:
Created attachment 168
The output of the XMLOutPutter

creator: justyna.horwat@sun.com
text:
Fix the syntax generated by XmlOutputter. Properly check and close an element
with no body. Fixed in Tomcat 4.0.
